page.title: 20Longdon Local Government
page.content:
The{Longdon Parish}is in the{County {Council division }which stretches 9 miles from{Worcester}to the{border with{Gloucestershire.
The local {Parish Council} has{nine {members }and{a clerk}and is{concerned with{Longdon, Queenhill and Holdfast. It has just completed a{questionnaire about the{workings of Parish Councils for the{ Centre of Urban and Regional {Studies.
{ Recent concerns }have been{flooding, {over-hanging hedges,}the distribution of{bus-tokens to pensioners}and{speed {limits}through the villages. The local {Electricity Board }is to be contacted about {street lights} coming on too early in the evening.
